verbLexeme: 1. To apply a plaster or a Band-Aid to a part of your body.
generalMeaning: A strip of something on a part of your body, especially your hand or your foot, or any thing or any action directly or indirectly associated with this, particularly a band-aid.
nominalLexeme: 1. A strip of sticky material used for covering small cuts and sores on your body. English = plaster, Band-Aid (a trademark for a type of sticky plaster).
oldEntry: Popular explanation: form of a band-aid.
